com.ccc.deeplearning.datasets

Class MnistImageFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.RandomAccessFile
      • com.ccc.deeplearning.datasets.MnistDbFile
        • com.ccc.deeplearning.datasets.MnistImageFile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, DataInput, DataOutput, AutoCloseable

    public class MnistImageFile
extends MnistDbFile
    MNIST database image file. Contains additional header information for the number of rows and columns per each entry.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MnistImageFile(String name, String mode)
      Creates new MNIST database image file ready for reading.
